review: I loved the concept of it however I could also see it becoming very boring after you have viewed much of the videos that were available. I believe Fire TV will be as good as the content that must constantly be updated and offered on the Amazon Fire TV system. I returned mine because it became defective on or about the 3rd or 4th night of my ownership. I know it is a new venture and another new piece of electronic equipment which inevitably will have some bugs to iron out. It is the very nature of the beast. I will purchase another in the very near future but until that time I hope Amazon is able to revamp the device and to fix all of its little inherent problems.
